episodes.title: PASTOR DOWELL EXPOSED by Ex-Jehovah’s Witness: Bethany Leger Tells the Truth About CULT CONTROL!
episodes.description:
In this explosive Warsheep Podcast LIVE, we welcome Bethany Leger, a brave woman who broke free from the psychological prison of the Jehovah’s Witnesses after spending 30 years inside the cult. Raised under crushing expectations of obedience, shame, and faux holiness, Bethany began unraveling when her mental health collapsed in her 20s. Her eating disorder wasn’t vanity, it was survival. She lost her family but gained her freedom.

Now, she’s calling out the darkness in religious institutions that hide behind righteousness, including her raw perspective on **Pastor Dowell**, who’s made waves with his doctrine and masculine movement. Bethany doesn’t hold back as she draws shocking parallels between cult-like control, emotional manipulation, and spiritual abuse in both systems.

Watch live as she shakes the foundation of religious deception, warns about toxic authority, and empowers others to think for themselves. This is not just a conversation, it’s a confrontation** with truth.
